DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness HIV Vaccine HIV-Negative Adults North America Who Are Risk HIV Infection
DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers receive 7 blind , intramuscular vaccination ( Months 0 , 1 , 6 , 12 , 18 , 24 , 30 ) contain either AIDSVAX B/B vaccine placebo ( aluminum adjuvant ) . Volunteers randomize 2 1 vaccine-to-placebo ratio . HIV-uninfected person follow total 16 visit begin screen continue Month 36 . Patients become HIV infect study follow every 4 month least 24 month .
DOC.criteria: Exclusion Criteria You eligible study : Use injection drug . Have history serious disease condition , include lymphoma . Have ever receive HIV vaccine . Have take postexposure treatment prevent HIV infection within 4 week prior study entry . Are plan take HIV vaccine study . Are pregnant . Have take certain medication receive certain therapy , include chemotherapy radiation . Have receive certain vaccine within 24 week prior study entry . You may eligible study : Are HIVnegative . Are 18 60 year old . Are available 3 year followup . Agree use effective method birth control study 90 day . Are one follow : A woman currently sexual relationship HIVpositive man . A woman one male partner least one sexually transmitted disease ( STD ) within past 12 month . A man sex men anal intercourse within past 12 month . ( You eligible relationship one HIVnegative man least 12 month . )
